creator: LvlApp Action, Adventure games and Virtual Reality
descriptionHtml:
Welcome in VR Zombie Horror Games House of Evil Terror 360.
Enter the most creepy rooms you can imagine, feel someone's breath in your neck.
Something is wrong around you. You do not even know why and where you are but you know you have to keep going, start investigating the back story because maybe then you can get out and leave alive.
The minutes with horror & excitement is awaiting for you. You are lost in deep black darkness and trying to find a way.

Experience the conjuring of the haunting horror game ideal for halloween or dark nights with:

- Amazing 3D High End Graphics
- Stunning Haunted Horror Atmosphere
- Virtual Reality experience!
- 360 degree audio and visuals
- Head tracking
- Supports multiple VR headsets

Be ready for
VR Zombie Horror Games House of Evil Terror 360
descriptionShort: VR Zombie horror games in virtual reality. House of evil terror waits in 360.

- The new roller coaster "Booster" is here!
- There will be a new attraction every two weeks!

- We have added a completely new, more readable menu with an attractive design.

- A completely new environment. Now more realistic than
ever.
- From now our films and rides can also be viewed without VR googles in No VR mode!

title: VR Zombie Horror Games House of Evil Terror 360

creator: Reality Games VR 360 Simulator
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to VR Zombie Horror Games House of Evil Terror 360.
House of evil with the most creepy rooms you can imagine, feel someone's breath in your neck.
Something is wrong around you. You do not even know why and where you are but you know you have to keep going, start investigating the back story because maybe then you can get out and leave alive.
The minutes with horror & excitement is awaiting for you. You are lost in evil deep black darkness and trying to find a way. House of evil full of terror waiting for you!

Experience the conjuring of the haunting horror game ideal for halloween or dark nights with:

- House evil with amazing 3D High-End Graphics
- Stunning Haunted Horror Atmosphere
- Virtual Reality experience!
- 360 degree audio and visuals of evil terror
- Terror 360 with head tracking
- Our evil terror game supports multiple VR headsets
- Creepy house of evil with many scary attractions

Feel the fear of entering the house of evil and face your fears. Join now and discover what evil terror 360 is. The perfect game for fans of thrills and horror movies. Try and check if you can survive in our house evil!

Enter to the scary house and be ready for Zombie in:
VR Zombie Horror Games House of Evil Terror 360

Do you like our game with evil terror? Don't forget to rate it in-store.
